name: Nostalgia Konaste
summary: Nostalgia is the Konaste (Konami Game Station) home version of the arcade piano game Nostalgia. The game visually and thematically is based on Nostalgia Op.3, the latest entry in the series, which is a part of the Bemani line of rhythm arcade games. However, the arcade and Konaste versions of Bemani games have differing content and game modes, making them separate games even if visually and thematically they may similar.
